name: bruiser
finisher: You finally land a decisive blow, knocking the bruiser onto a table, flinging glasses wildly around the bar!

name: pissed off cook
finisher: After scoring a dizzying blow, you slam the cook’s face down against the grill, until you hear a sizzle. You let us body fall limp onto the ground.

name: elven boy
finisher: You stomp the boy beneath your boot, while reassuring yourself you’re a good person.

name: twigged out grandpa
finisher: You pry the flailing old man off of you, and realize he’s dead before he hits the ground.

name: scavenger
finisher: You close within the scavenger’s guard and slam the bow forward into his skull.

name: mutated dog
finisher: With a howl, you put the beast out of its misery. Looking back, you aren’t sure who was doing the howling.

name: a pack of raccoons
finisher: With a final blow, the surviving raccoons scatter and flee.

name: brawny scout
finisher: The chonky lad finally wavers and collapses from your assault.

name: speedy scout
finisher: The scout jumps and jives, and after your last blow, wails.

name: quadcopter
finisher: You bait the drone into swinging down low, and finally connect hard enough to scatter it into tiny bits. You wonder who might be operating it...

name: octocopter
finisher: Your prolonged engagement eventually wears down its battery, and it drifts to the ground.
